title: To be a conductor
brief_description: An absorbing documentary following the activities of the young conductor Michael Tilson Thomas. He studies the score of Brahms’ “Serenade No. 1 for Orchestra”, and finally conducts it at a music festival. The film is enriched by his comments on conducting and the role of music in his life.
